title: Cause of an increase in real output in long run

content.prompt: Which of the following will most likely cause an increase in real output in the long run?

choices.label: A decrease in the labor force participation rate
An increase in the velocity of money
An open-market sale of government bonds by the central bank

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
